newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore Bus sees 1996 worse than 1995.
newsitem.headline: Singapore Bus sees 1996 worse than 1995.

text.p: Singapore Bus Services 1978 Ltd (SBS) said on Tuesday it expected its full-year results in 1996 to be worse than in 1995.

In a statement isued with its half-year results, SBS said contributions from its transportation business were unlikely to pick up. Manpower costs were higher and this would have "an unfortunate impact on bus operations".
"The directors do not expect the results of the group for the year to match that of last year," it said.
SBS said earlier its net profit for the six months to June 30, 1996 had fallen by 27.9 percent year-on-year to Singapore $23.66 million.
